creator: North Loop
descriptionHtml:
North Loop is the global bank account for anyone in the US. Get the benefits of premium global banking at zero cost - the future of banking is here.

International students can sign up without a social security number. Sign up for a bank account before you come to the US, and have your North Loop Visa® Debit Card waiting for you when you land. Bank anywhere, anytime with the North Loop mobile app and pay zero fees when your family sends you money (that’s right - no incoming wire fees!). Spend money abroad easily with no foreign transaction fees

Use the North Loop mobile banking app to start saving money today. No account fees. No incoming wire fees.


Start banking with North Loop - signing up is free and takes less than 2 minutes. When you bank with us, you get a Visa® Debit Card, a Checking Account, global 24/7 customer service and more.


One simple app with a bunch of features:

• FDIC Insured Checking Account

• No Account Fees

• No monthly fees

• No incoming wire fees

• No foreign transaction fees

• Over 32,000 fee-free ATMs

• No minimum balance requirements

• No overdraft fees

• Instant transaction notifications - stay in control of your money

• Lock your card instantly in-app

• Stay protected - EMV chip card security and VISA Zero Liability

• 24/7 customer support that cares about you


Start banking in 3 easy steps:

1. Download the app

2. Sign up in less than 2 minutes

3. Start banking!



Opening a North Loop bank account won’t impact your credit score.  For more information please visit www.nolobank.com.


As seen on NBC, CBS, ABC, MSNBC.



Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.


Banking Services provided by Evolve Bank & Trust, Member FDIC. The North Loop Visa® Debit Card is issued by Evolve Bank & Trust pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.
descriptionShort: No-fee banking. Zero incoming wire fees. No ATM fees. Sign up in 2 minutes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Now sign up even faster with our new streamlined app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Link your Indian bank accounts and track your expenses!

title: North Loop - No fee global banking

creator: North Loop
descriptionHtml:
The global bank account for global citizens - North Loop is your financial hub for all your money, designed exclusively for NRIs.

With North Loop, you can:
Get a free US Bank Account - no account minimums, no transfer fees, no ATM fees
High Interest Fixed Deposits - get up to 7% on our NRE and NRO FDs.
Send money abroad for free - easy, transparent FX rates for your remittances to India
Manage your money - link all your bank accounts and credit cards and use our free money manager to manage all your finances. We’ll give you insight on where you’re spending your money.
Budgeting and Tracking - see what you’re spending, where you can save money and track your bills. Link your credit cards and never miss a payment.

Get the benefits of premium private banking at zero cost - the future of banking is here.

Get high interest FDs for NRE and NRO up to 7% in 5 minutes.

Send money abroad quickly and easily, at the lowest possible cost with North Loop. The fastest delivery, and the lowest and most transparent exchange rates.

Use the North Loop mobile banking app to start saving money today. No account fees. No incoming wire fees.

One simple app with a bunch of features:

FDIC Insured (up to $250,000) Checking Account
No Account Fees
No Transfer Fees
No monthly fees
No incoming wire fees
Send money for free
No foreign transaction fees
No ATM Fees
No minimum balance requirements
No overdraft fees
Instant transaction notifications - stay in control of your money
Lock your card instantly in-app
Stay protected - EMV chip card security and 24/7 customer support that cares about you


Start banking in 3 easy steps:

1. Download the app
2. Sign up in less than 2 minutes
3. Start banking!

Remit money to India for free. The fastest and cheapest money transfer app there is.
Send money to India for free and cheaply.

Opening a North Loop bank account won’t impact your credit score.  For more information please visit www.nolobank.com.

As seen on NBC, CBS, ABC, MSNBC.

Banking Services provided by Evolve Bank & Trust, Member FDIC. The North Loop Mastercard® Debit Card is issued by Evolve Bank & Trust pursuant to a license from Mastercard Inc. and may be used everywhere Mastercard debit cards are accepted.
descriptionShort: No-fee banking. Zero incoming wire fees. No ATM fees. Sign up in 2 minutes.

descriptionShort: No-fee banking. Zero incoming wire fees. No ATM fees. Sign up in 2 minutes.
title: North Loop - No fee global banking

creator: North Loop
descriptionHtml:
North Loop is your financial hub for all your money, designed exclusively for NRIs.

Invest in stocks and mutual funds, buy insurance and buy Bitcoin

Invest in crypto - Bitcoin and more
- Invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum and other crypto!
- The most transparent fees

Invest in US stocks and ETFs in minutes:
- No minimum deposit
- $1 a trade and over 3,000 US stocks and ETFs to invest in.
- Fractional share investing - invest in stocks like Amazon, Google and Tesla for as little as $5! Invest in some of the worlds largest companies like Apple and Microsoft, and buy fractional shares rather than the whole share. US stock investing is now affordable for all Indians.
- Sell and withdraw anytime.
- View your portfolio, analytics, and performance of US stocks
- Invest in stocks from different sectors such as tech, real estate, telecom, healthcare, finance

Get insurance from the comfort of your home
- Affordable health insurance no medical needed
- Life insurance.
- COVID-19 covered
- Superfast claims process
- Monthly premiums starting as low as Rs 250!

Get health insurance for your parents in India.

Investing in the best mutual funds made simple & easy
North Loop makes it easy and simple to invest in the best mutual funds and reach your financial goals even earlier.

With a few clicks, you can set up a monthly SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) or a One-Time Investment in our selected top mutual funds of 2020.

Invest in mutual funds using North Loop app, the trusted online investment platform for the modern Indian.

Invest in best mutual funds with the North Loop app:
- Zero fees and no transaction charges
- 100% paperless KYC process - start investing in minutes
- Easily invest in any mutual fund with SIPs or lumpsum investment
- Our helpful personal finance calculators
- Track your investments
- Create personalized financial investment plans for your financial goals e.g. buy a home, retirement planning, saving for your child’s education

Our mutual funds partners
- ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund
- HDFC Mutual Fund
- Kotak Mutual Fund
- SBI Mutual Fund
- Tata Mutual Fund
- Motilal Oswal Mutual Funds
- L&T Mutual Fund
- Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund
- Axis Mutual Fund
- PPFAS Mutual Fund
- Mirae Asset Mutual Fund
- And more!

As seen on CNBC

• Free Mutual Fund SIP calculator
• Invest in mutual funds by starting a SIP/lump sum in a few clicks
• Stock trading made simple - buy and sell shares with with 1-click

Smart way to save tax for the year 2021
- Get access to top ELSS mutual funds and save up to Rs 46,500 under Section 80C
- Start a SIP investment that lets you grow your money and reduce your tax

Bank-grade Security, with 256-bit SSL encryption
Fraud Protection: We protect your account from unauthorized activity.
Privacy Protection: We will never sell your personal information to a third party.

Bank-grade Security
256-bit encryption and industry-leading security means your data is secure with us.

As seen on NBC, CBS, ABC, MSNBC.
descriptionShort: Invest in US stocks, mutual funds and crypto
